name: ClosetMaid ShelfTrack 4-Drawer Kit with Adjustable Metal Drawers
description: Create additional drawer space on your ShelfTrack system with ClosetMaid's 4-Drawer Kit. It includes brackets, shelves and 17 in. deep metal wire drawers for a variety of storage options. The drawers are adjustable, helping you create a system that meets your unique needs. This 27 in. H x 21 in. W x 17 in. D kit helps you store more without having to install a new system, saving you time and money for your next project.Sturdy metal construction to accommodate heavier itemsOne 4 in. high drawer and three 7 in. high drawers for tops, socks, accessories and moreEasy installation with ShelfTrack standards (sold separately)White epoxy finishManufacturer replacement of missing or damaged parts
